_instructions: Add your projects here with tags and highlights.
subtitle: A selection of projects I've designed and developed

projects.title: Retaining Ring Analysis
projects.description:
Conducted finite element analysis of retaining rings under displace-
ment boundary conditions. Identified yielding risks and recommended material/design changes to enhance durability.

projects.title: Overhead Crane Redesign
projects.description:
Re-engineered hanging end truck
of an overhead crane, applying DFM/DFA principles. Achieved 10% manufacturing cost reduction while maintaining
load-bearing performance.

projects.title: Heat Pipe Simulation
projects.description:
Modeled heat pipe thermal behavior using orthotropic
cylindrical block simulation. Generated temperature contours and airflow velocity vectors around fan-heat sink assembly,
validating thermal efficiency.

projects.title: Automotive Sub-System Design
projects.description:
Designed and optimized routing for fuel
feed pump, radiator fan, tail lamp, and starter motor assemblies. Reduced wiring harness cost by 10% through clash
detection and optimized layouts.

projects.title: Locomotive Component Definition
projects.description:
Supported PDE activities for lo-
comotive systems. Developed manufacturable sheet metal, piping, and wire harness designs, ensuring compliance with
ASME standards and reducing rework by 15%.
